name: ansible
tagline: An agentless automation tool for configuration management and application deployment
description: Ansible is a widely-used IT automation and configuration management tool that coordinates server provisioning, application deployment, and orchestration using YAML-based playbooks. It is agentless and works over SSH.

features.title: It Automation
features.description: Automate server provisioning, configuration, and application deployment. Reduce manual work dramatically

features.title: Yaml Playbooks
features.description: Define infrastructure as code using simple, readable YAML syntax. Easy to learn and maintain

features.title: Agentless
features.description: Works over SSH without requiring agents on target systems. Minimal setup required

features.title: Orchestration
features.description: Coordinate complex multi-tier deployments across hundreds of servers. Scale effortlessly

features.title: Extensive Modules
features.description: Thousands of built-in modules for common tasks and integrations. Ready to use

features.title: Idempotent
features.description: Run playbooks repeatedly with consistent, predictable results. Safe automation

features.title: Community Support
features.description: Massive ecosystem with shared roles and playbooks. Never start from scratch
